channel.title: Comments on: Nine Tips for Navigating the Application Process

item.title: By: Sam Pierce
item.dc:creator: Sam Pierce
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/nine-tips-for-navigating-the-application-process/#comment-77">sharon ng</a>.
Sorry that you're having trouble! Please call or email us in the office and we'll do our best to get it sorted out.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to sharon ng.

Sorry that you’re having trouble! Please call or email us in the office and we’ll do our best to get it sorted out.

item.title: By: sharon ng
item.dc:creator: sharon ng
item.description:
I found your online application is really confusing. I created an account one week ago and did not submit my application (for my daughter) at the time. Today, when I tried to access to my account, I could not any info or instruction there.
A mom.
item.content:encoded:
I found your online application is really confusing. I created an account one week ago and did not submit my application (for my daughter) at the time. Today, when I tried to access to my account, I could not any info or instruction there.

A mom.
